**[TF Maltby Antique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140320224748/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/TFMaltbyAntique_interiors.php)** by Treacyfaces [1992]

PS: The funny thing is that I found this when googling:

> Treacyfaces Inc - 43 Maltby Ave, West Haven, ...

Did they name the font after their company address road? :-)
